string.value: #b#p9010010##k seems to have something urgent to tell you.
Hunt the Star Pixies that are casting magic on anyone and everyone, and report to #b#p2012020##k. \n\n#o3230200# #r#a98441##k
You regulated the Star Pixies that were out of control.
Testing one, two, three! Come in, over! Respond if you can hear my voice, over.

I'm glad you can hear me all the way from Cloud Park. Do you know Alfonse Green? You must have seen him while walking around... In any case, he says that he can't freely travel because of the Star Pixies who use their magic on anyone who passes by.
So eliminate #r100 #o3230200#s#k and deliver the news to #b#p2012020##k.
What? Are you trying to act as if you didn't hear me?
I told you to defeat #r100 Star Pixies#k and go see #bAlfonse Green#k...
Please take care of the #rStar Pixies#k. Eliminate #r100#k of them and then return to me.
